channel.title: Cthulhu Dark: The Secret of Castronegro
channel.description:
This is for a game of Cthulhu Dark using the old CoC module The Secret of Castronegro.
X-card will be in use.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZvcawuOV5EbpGUklhq
